src_original: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti /
tadyathā bhagavan yena rājñaścakravartinaścakraratnaṃ gacchati tena sarvo balakāyo gacchati,
evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇa gacchati,  tena sarve buddhadharmā gacchanti /
tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
sā mayā (Bhk 195) pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /

tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /  dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /  āyataneṣu śūnyagrāmavat pratyavekṣaṇāpratipattirna cāyatanaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
yathoktam āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre- “atha khalvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahasattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
